article.Heading: Relief for exporters: Sources say scheme like duty drawback likely
article.Summary: The Finance Ministry today said the GST Council is exploring ways to address working capital concerns of exporters. This as the ministry announced its decision to give refund by linking form GSTR 1 with form GSTR 3-B and also instructed central and state authorities to clear pending pre-GST refund claims. CNBC-TV18's Timsy Jaipuria gave us these details.
